title: Group portrait of wedding party with ten women including bride Arlene Allen Gaines Hollinger wearing satin wedding gown with sweetheart neckline and lace trimmed veil, holding prayer book with ribbons and orange blossoms, maid of honor Annabelle Showell, Marjorie Ellen Gaines, Evelyn Gaines Love, Lillian Dozier, Jessie Lou Childs, Helen Scott, Geraldine French, Aileen Smith, Wilma Delaney; ten men including groom Leonard Claybert Hollinger, best man Homer Hollinger, Otis French, Walter Whitmore, Leonard Long, Theodore Oden, Edward Scott, Joseph Smith, Harold Peteet, and Robert Connor; two girls Velma Jeanne and Lorie Love; and two boys, twins Donald and Dennis Smalley, posed in front of dark crushed velvet curtain, in First Baptist Church, another version
medium: black and white: Ansco Safety Film
